page.title: 08Shopping Habits
page.content: Most people who live in{Bourton-on- {the-Water}shop in the village where there is a wide range of shops even though there is a{high proportion}of gift shops catering for visitors.{Most {villagers}interviewed about their {shopping habits}say they would rather {support the local shops}even though prices may be higher than in town supermarkets. Two shops, the {International}and{the Cotswold Store,} provide many local people with their everyday needs, most shopping once a week. Those with private cars frequently shop in{Cheltenham, {Cirencester, Banbury}and{Chipping {Norton.}There are no shops in{Wyck {Rissington}or{Little Rissington}though papers, groceries and meat are delivered to the two villages. Most villagers shop in{Bourton, Cheltenham, {Stow-on-the-Wold}or{Moreton-in-Marsh.
